#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define FOR(a, b, i) for (int i = a; i < b; ++i)

typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<VI> VVI;
typedef vector<bool> VB;
typedef vector<VB> VVB;
typedef pair<int, int> ii;

#define x first
#define y second

int main() {
  cout.setf(ios::fixed);
  cout.precision(7);
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  cin.tie(0);
  int test;
  cin >> test;
  while (test--) {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int start = -1, sup = 0;
    VVB puc (n, VB (n));
    int x;
    FOR(0, n, i) FOR(0, n, j) {
      cin >> x;
      if (x == 1) puc[i][j] = true;
      else puc[i][j] = false;
    }
    VI quants (n, 0);
    FOR(0, n, i) FOR(0, n, j) quants[i] += puc[i][j];
    FOR(0, n, i) if (quants[i] > sup) {
      start = i;
      sup = quants[i];
    }
    if (n == 1) cout << "0 1\n";
    else if (quants[start] == n - 1) cout << 1 << ' ' << start + 1 << '\n';
    else cout << 2 << ' ' << start + 1 << '\n';
  }
}
